languages.text: "Прискорбно слышать об этом, Вольный Торговец. Надеюсь здесь, в родных стенах фамильной усадьбы, вам удастся отдохнуть и набраться сил".

traits.locale_text: "Прискорбно слышать об этом, Вольный Торговец. Надеюсь здесь, в родных стенах фамильной усадьбы, вам удастся отдохнуть и набраться сил".
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."
languages.original_text: "Прискорбно слышать об этом, Вольный Торговец. Надеюсь здесь, в родных стенах фамильной усадьбы, вам удастся отдохнуть и набраться сил".

traits.locale_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family homestead, you can rest and regather your strength."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family homestead, you can rest and regather your strength."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: “这真是个令人难过的消息，行商浪人。我希望在这里，在您家族庄园的高墙之内，您可以好好休养生息，重获力量。”
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: “这真是个令人难过的消息，行商浪人。我希望在这里，在您家族庄园的高墙之内，您可以好好休养生息，重获力量。”
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: «Lamento oírlo, Comerciante Independiente. Espero que aquí, entre los muros de su hacienda familiar, pueda descansar y recuperar fuerzas».
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento oírlo, Comerciante Independiente. Espero que aquí, entre los muros de su hacienda familiar, pueda descansar y recuperar fuerzas».
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: 「それは残念です、自由開拓者よ。あなたの家系がお守りくださるこの領地の壁の中で、休息をとり、力を取り戻すことを願います」
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: 「それは残念です、自由開拓者よ。あなたの家系がお守りくださるこの領地の壁の中で、休息をとり、力を取り戻すことを願います」
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Es betrübt mich, das zu hören, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich hoffe, dass Ihr hier in den Mauern Eures Familienanwesens ruhen und wieder zu Kräften kommen könnt."
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: "Es betrübt mich, das zu hören, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich hoffe, dass Ihr hier in den Mauern Eures Familienanwesens ruhen und wieder zu Kräften kommen könnt."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: « Vous m'en voyez navré de l'apprendre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'ose espérer qu'ici, entre les murs de votre domaine familial, vous pourrez vous reposer et reprendre vos forces. »
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'en voyez navré de l'apprendre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'ose espérer qu'ici, entre les murs de votre domaine familial, vous pourrez vous reposer et reprendre vos forces. »
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Bunu duymak beni derinden yaralıyor Hür Tacir. Umarım burada, aile mülkünüzün duvarları içerisinde dinlenip gücünüzü geri kazanabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "It saddens me to hear this, Rogue Trader. I hope that here, within the walls of your family estate, you can rest and regather your strength."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duymak beni derinden yaralıyor Hür Tacir. Umarım burada, aile malikânenizin duvarları içerisinde dinlenebilir ve gücünüzü geri kazanabilirsiniz."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr
